title: A Surcharge on Development undertaken by the promoter/Developer at the rate of 100% of Development charge shall be leviable, which may be paid in stages in proportionate with the progress of work
clause_text: A Surcharge on Development undertaken by the promoter/Developer at the rate of 100% of Development charge shall be leviable, which may be paid in stages in proportionate with the progress of work. This surcharge shall not be applicable to the construction within basic FSI, the built up area to be handed over to Municipal Corporation or any Public Authority in lieu of any reservation and also to the amenity areas to be handed over to the Municipal Corporations per the requirement indicated by the Municipal Corporation or the High Power Committee.
section: URS by Private Promoters / MHADA / Co-operative Housing Societies â€“
